intro.title: Arizona residency
intro.introduction: Your residency classification determines whether you pay in-state or out-of-state tuition and is determined when you are admitted based on guidelines provided by the Arizona Board of Regents. Questions in this section help determine your residency classification. You may be asked to provide documentation to confirm your status.

permanentHome.label: Begin by selecting the state you consider to be your permanent home.

isAzResident12m.label: Have you been living in Arizona continuously for the last 12 months?

dateMovedToAz.label: When did you begin living in Arizona?

isEnrolledInAnotherUni.label: Are you currently enrolled at another college or university?

inputEnrolledLocation.label: Where are you currently enrolled?
inputEnrolledLocation.placeholder: Enter name of college or university

selectStateEnrolled.label: In which state is that school located?

isEnrollAZedCurrentOrLastYear.label: Were you enrolled at any Arizona college or university in %current_year% or %current_year-1% calendar year?

isTaxClaimedAsDependent.label: Were you claimed as a dependent for income tax purposes by a parent or legal guardian for %current_year-1% or %current_year-2%?

isHavingLicense.label: Do you have a current driver’s license or state issued ID?

selectStateLicenseIssued.label: In which state was your license issued?

isOwnsVehicle.label: Do you own or operate a car, motorcycle or other motor vehicle?

isVehicleRegisteredInAZ.label: Is this vehicle registered in the state of Arizona?

isFiledTaxLastYear.label: Did you, or will you, file state taxes for %current_year-1%?

selectStateFiledTax.label: Where did or where will you file your state taxes for %current_year-1%?

sectionFinancialSupport.title: Financial support
sectionFinancialSupport.tooltip: The following questions are used to determine if you are financially independent. If you answer “yes” to any of the questions, you will be considered financially independent and will not be required to provide parental information.
sectionFinancialSupport.text: Estimate a percentage of financial support from each of the following sources for the last 12 months. Support includes housing, transportation, tuition, books, food, entertainment and healthcare. Indicate all that apply and list at least 50% for the parent/legal guardian category if your parents/legal guardians claim you on their taxes.

source.label: Parent or legal guardian financial support

otherOptions.label: Which describes your "other" source of financial support?(Check all that apply)?

source.label: State or Federal Benefits financial support

inputOtherSourceNota.label: Please describe your source of support:

permanentHome.label: Which state do you consider to be your permanent domicile (i.e., your true, fixed and permanent home)?
permanentHome.tooltip: Your residency classification determines whether you pay in-state or out-of-state tuition and is determined when you are admitted based on guidelines provided by the Arizona Board of Regents. Questions in this section help determine your residency classification. You may be asked to provide documentation to confirm your status.

isGraduateFromAZPublicSchool.label: Did you (or will you) graduate from an Arizona public or private high school, or homeschool equivalent, or obtain an Arizona high school equivalency diploma, e.g, GED?
isGraduateFromAZPublicSchool.tooltip:
Arizona Proposition 308 is a legislative referral that voters passed in the November 2022 election. With the passage of Arizona Prop. 308, some students who qualify as noncitizens may be eligible for an in-state college tuition rate.
Answers to these questions will help determine your residency classification. You may be asked to provide documentation to confirm your status. More information about Prop 308 can be found here.

isAttendAZPublicSchool.label: Did you (or will you) attend an Arizona public or private high school, or homeschool while physically present in Arizona for a minimum of two years?
